title: Noodle (2007) DvDrip.Avi
description:
Noodle (2007) DvDrip.Avi

In this sweet comedic drama, Israeli film star Mili Avital plays the elegant Miri Calderone, an El Al flight attendant who has been twice widowed by war. Her life isn't empty, but it's emotionally sterile. Her Chinese maid rushes out of the house one day and disappears. Miri and her sister find themselves caring for the maidÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s young Chinese son while they search for his mother.  The boy, whom they call "NoodleÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½, speaks no English and no Hebrew, and neither of the sisters speak Chinese. The results are predictable, but the film has unexpected depth. It's a good ride and certainly a charming tale.  

This heartwarming little gem of a movie will leave you in a good mood!

IMDB: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0892332/
IMDB Rating: 7.7/10 (200 Votes)
Language: Hebrew and Chinese (with English subtitles)
Runtime: 90 Minutes

This film won the following 2007 Awards of the Israeli Film Academy:  
-	Best Film
-	Best Actress (Mili Avital) 
-	Best Supporting Actress (Anat Waxman)
-	Best Director (Ayelet Menahemi)
-	Best Cinematography (Itzik Porta)
It won the Grand Jury Prize and Best Screenplay at the 2007 Montreal World Film Festival (Canada)
It was an audience favorite at 2008 Palm Springs International Film Festival (USA)
